title.narrative: INCLUSIVE - QUALITY EDUCATION

description.narrative: The Ministry of Education has the technical capacity to guarantee inclusive, quality education, whereby children and adolescents, especially those from more vulnerable populations, have access to, remain in and perform successfully in school.

System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The Ministry of Education has the technical capacity to guarantee inclusive, quality education, whereby children and adolescents, especially those from more vulnerable populations, have access to, remain in and perform successfully in school.

description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to improve the technical skills of the MoE's key personnel, enabling them to replicate the training processes to larger audiences of education public servants in charge of developing quality inclusive education to all, and particularly to children with disabilities, children from rural and isolated areas, and adolescents. Along with the training, UNICEF has also contributed to the development of educational tools, particularly in the areas of disabilities and early stimulation. UNICEF also supported the revision and updating of the Teachers Schools curricula and graduates' profile, helping the system to ensure the most appropriate teachers' qualification. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:24/01/2019

title.narrative: Number of teachers in training who have taken a curriculum that incorporates the approaches of inclusion, gender and emergencies

System Strengthening - Gender - Existence of quality prevention and response mechanisms to address gender based violence in and around schools - score (1-4), see guidance
Number of mothers, fathers and caregivers who participate in meetings and spaces of school life
Number of directors of education centers who improve their pedagogical practice in the classroom in student learning issues
Number of children supported with distance/home-based learning [COVIDSitRep]
Number of schools implementing safe school protocols (COVID-19 prevention and control) [COVIDSitRep]
